entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
